name: PhiNesse Corrector Pen
short_description: Transform every makeup look and correct each mistake without having to wipe the rest of the makeup.
long_description: PhiNesse Corrector Pen creates precision around eyes and lips makeup, sweeping away all the smudges and smears. It will make your makeup game time efficient, great for correcting mistakes or a quick look change. It corrects the makeup without disrupting it, at the same time being gentle to the skin or eye are.Removes eyeshadow fall out and smudges, dots away the splotches of mascara that rub onto your eyelids, gives a precision and shape to the eyeliner and easily sharpens the lip liner and lipstick smudges to give the lips ultra defined look.The pen includes 3 replacement tips, once the correction tip needs replacement you can easily insert a clean one.
